casebody.data:
Portage Cty. Bd. of Dev. Disabilities
v.
Portage Cty. Educators' Assn. for Dev. Disabilities 2018-0628 Supreme Court of Ohio. July 18, 2018

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

O'Donnell and Kennedy, JJ., dissent.

APPEALS NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

Fischer, J., dissents and would accept the cause on proposition of law No. III.
